replies.author: 白琥
replies.txt_content:
楼上说错了
应该是mangaddp builder -nick
求最佳

replies.author: 红菜头糕
replies.txt_content:
mangaddp builder -essentials.nick
添加负权后玩家就没有权限再执行nick这个指令

replies.author: 白琥
replies.txt_content:

应该是mangaddp builder -nick
求最佳
